name: Chibi Inu [OLD]
description: Chibi Inu Token ($CHIBI) combines the adorable vibes of Chibi culture with the wild, woofy world of Inu tokens. Chibi Token brings together the cuteness of Chibi characters and the popularity of dog-themed tokens, with an innovative contract, to create a fun and engaging token. Chibi Token introduces a revolutionary approach to taxation within the cryptocurrency world through its innovative flat tax system. This system simplifies the complex world of crypto transactions by applying a consistent and flat tax rate for all users. Our proposed contract applies a fixed tax of $10 to every buy or sell transaction, regardless of its value. This is a new type of taxing to ERC20 contracts
